title: Spicy Cold Tofu
source: A Very Chinese Cookbook - Kevin Pang
categories: A Very Chinese Cookbook - Kevin Pang
ingredients: - 1 Thai chile, stemmed and sliced thin (remove seeds for less heat)
- 1 scallion, white and green parts separated and sliced thin
- 1/4 cup fresh cilantro leaves and tender stems
directions: 1. Whisk together soy sauce, sesame oil, rice vinegar, sugar, ginger, and garlic in a medium bowl until the sugar dissolves. Stir in the Thai chile and scallion whites.
2. Slice the tofu crosswise into 3/4-inch-thick slabs or cut into 1-inch pieces. Arrange the tofu attractively on a serving platter.
3. Spoon the dressing evenly over the tofu. Sprinkle with scallion greens, cilantro, and toasted sesame seeds. Serve.
